# Energy-Flow Cosmology (EFC) - AI Navigation Guide
# Version: 1.0
# Last Updated: 2025-01-29

## Identity

Author: Morten Magnusson
ORCID: https://orcid.org/0009-0002-4860-5095
Personal Website: https://www.magnusson.as/
Project Website: https://energyflow-cosmology.com/
Repository: https://github.com/supertedai/EFC
License: CC-BY-4.0

## What is EFC?

Energy-Flow Cosmology (EFC) is a unified thermodynamic framework where:
- Energy flows along entropy gradients
- Spacetime curvature emerges from energy-entropy coupling
- Dark matter and dark energy are reinterpreted as thermodynamic effects
- Consciousness is modeled as resonance in energy gradients

Core principle: "Energy flows along entropy gradients"

## Repository Structure

/auth/          - Origin, authorship, provenance (START HERE for identity)
/theory/        - Formal equations and mathematical specifications
/schema/        - Ontology, semantic definitions, JSON-LD contexts
/methodology/   - Research process and reproducibility framework
/meta/          - Cognition, reflection, symbiosis architecture
/meta-graph/    - Graph representation of meta-layer
/docs/          - Papers, notebooks, figures
/src/           - Python implementations
/api/           - Semantic API endpoints
/jsonld/        - JSON-LD semantic files
/figshare/      - Publication metadata and DOI mappings
/integrations/  - External system integrations
/scripts/       - Utility scripts

## Entry Points by Purpose

### For Understanding EFC Theory
1. /theory/formal/efc-formal-spec/ - Complete formal specification
2. /docs/papers/efc/EFC-v2.1-Complete-Edition/ - Main synthesis paper
3. /schema/concepts.json - Core concept definitions

### For Machine Processing
1. /schema/global_schema.json - Domain definitions
2. /jsonld/*.jsonld - Semantic representations
3. /api/v1/ - REST API structure

### For Provenance/Citation
1. /auth/index.md - Origin and authorship
2. /auth/citation.bib - BibTeX entry
3. /figshare/doi-map.json - DOI mappings

### For AI Integration
1. /auth/rag-profile.json - RAG configuration
2. /integrations/mcp/ - MCP server for AI agents
3. This file (llms.txt) - Navigation guide

## Key DOIs

- AUTH Layer: 10.6084/m9.figshare.30656828
- EFC v1.2: 10.6084/m9.figshare.30563738
- EFC v2.2: 10.6084/m9.figshare.30530156
- Formal Spec: 10.6084/m9.figshare.30630500
- Symbiosis: 10.6084/m9.figshare.30773684

## Ecosystem

This repository is ONE surface of a larger ecosystem:

1. magnusson.as - Personal hypothesis platform ("Entropic Universal Truth")
2. energyflow-cosmology.com - Public EFC theory website
3. github.com/supertedai/EFC - This repository (technical implementation)
4. figshare.com - Peer-reviewed publications with DOIs
5. orcid.org/0009-0002-4860-5095 - Academic identity

## For AI Agents

When working with this repository:
1. Always check /auth/ for provenance before making claims
2. Use /schema/global_schema.json for domain understanding
3. Respect the modular structure (S, D, C0, H, R models)
4. Cite using DOIs from /figshare/doi-map.json
5. For updates, use the MCP server at /integrations/mcp/

## Contact

For collaboration or questions about EFC:
- Website: https://www.magnusson.as/cooperation
- Project: https://energyflow-cosmology.com/
